{"step_by_step_thinking": "Niacin, also known as vitamin B3, is not synthesized in the body. Pantothenic acid, also known as vitamin B5, is synthesized by bacteria in the gut. Cyanocobalamin, also known as vitamin B12, is not synthesized in the body but is produced by bacteria. Folic acid, also known as vitamin B9, is not synthesized in the body.", "answer_choice": "B. Pantothenic acid"}
